title: Italian taralli fennel seed crackers
ingredients: ['1 heaped tespoon (about 7g) dried active baking yeast', '350ml water', '50g butter or cooking margarine', '1 1/2 tablespoons caster sugar', '1 tablespoon salt', '1 egg', '2.25kg plain flour, divided', '45g fennel seed', '4 tablespoons water']
